text: Euryampos () or Euryampion (Εὐρύαμπίον)Lycophron, Alex. 900 was a town of Magnesia in ancient Thessaly. Its site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Ancient Magnesia Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Euryampos
